scripts.minify: rm -rf public && mkdir public && cp -R img public && cp priconne-nano.zip public && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true -o public/index.html index.html
